name: Leather Clutch (Suede Pink)
description:
Our Leather Clutch is a cinch. Just slip your hand into the natural leather strap and hold onto your clutch with ease. It's great for a night on the town or a trip to the local market. 

Features:
- Designed & Assembled in Los Angeles, California by Mimot Studio 
- External Footprint: 8.5” x 6.5”
- Available in genuine leather or suede

Shipping:
FREE GROUND SHIPPING

name: Canvas Folding Tote (Navy)
description:
The Canvas Tote is the non graphic version of our Suspenders Tote. It's meant to be your all around canvas tote. It's made from a single sheet of heavy weight canvas, so it will last for years to come. Easily collapsible, tied and tucked away, pull out this tote whenever you need an extra bag. Perfect for weekend trips, market, or just about anything you throw at it.

Features:
- Designed & Assembled in Los Angeles, California by Mimot Studio 
- Bag compartment is assembled from one piece of heavy weight canvas. 
- Internal Footprint: 12" x 8" x 15"
- Available in 5 colorways.
- Weight tested at 50+ lbs. 
- Fold over for shopping light, or extend out for a full load of goods. 

Accessories:
Optional Carrier Straps, Sold separately

Cleaning Instructions: 
Spot Clean Only

Shipping:
FREE GROUND SHIPPING

name: Nylon Large Tote (Red/Yellow)
description:
In response to our customers requests, we made a larger version of our market tote.  It's made from a single sheet of super strong rip-stop nylon and then lined with another sheet of nylon. Easily collapsible, tied and tucked away, pull out this bag whenever you need an extra bag. And in case you have some smaller items to carry, there are two pockets on the outside of the bag.

Features:
- Designed & Assembled in Los Angeles, California by Mimot Studio 
- Bag compartment is assembled from one piece of Ripstop Nylon/Polyester. 
- Internal Footprint: 12” x 8” x 15” 
- 2 external pockets
- Available in 4 colorways.
- Water-resistant & Weight tested at 45+ lbs. 
- Fold over for shopping light, or extend out for a full load of goods. 
- It can easily be collapsed & tied, via a loop-knot feature.

Cleaning Instructions: 
Machine Washable, Cold, Gentle Cycle

Shipping:
FREE GROUND SHIPPING

name: Book Tote (Gray/Burgundy)
description:
Our book totes were designed to last a lifetime, while looking great on your arm. It's made from a single sheet of super strong rip-stop nylon. Each bag can easily hold 35 pounds. Easily collapsible, tied and tucked away, pull out this bag whenever you need an extra bag.  Perfect for trips to the library or farmers market. And in case you have some smaller items to carry, there are two pockets on the outside of the bag.

Features:
- Designed & Assembled in Los Angeles, California by Mimot Studio 
- Bag compartment is assembled from one piece of Ripstop Nylon/Polyester. 
- Internal Footprint: 9” x 6” x 16” 
- 2 external pockets
- Available in 5 colorways.
- Water-resistant & Weight tested at 35+ lbs. 
- Fold over for shopping light, or extend out for a full load of goods. 
- It can easily be collapsed & tied, via a loop-knot feature.

Cleaning Instructions: 
Machine Washable, Cold, Gentle Cycle

Shipping:
FREE GROUND SHIPPING

description:

- Designed in Los Angeles, California.
- Bag compartment is assembled from one piece of tear resistant Tyvek paper.
- Internal Footprint:  11” x 7” x 13.5”
- Mimot Bags are intentionally crumpled.
- Water-resistant & Weight tested at 15 lbs.
- Fold over for shopping light, or extend out for a full load of goods.
- It can easily be collapsed & tied, via a loop-knot feature.

Cleaning Instructions:
Wipe with a damp towel.

Shipping:
FREE GROUND SHIPPING

name: Reusable Tote (Mint w/ White)
description:
Features:
- Designed in Los Angeles, California.
- Bag compartment is assembled from one piece of tear resistant Tyvek paper.
- Internal Footprint:  13” x 8” x 15”
- Mimot Bags are intentionally crumpled.
- Water-resistant & Weight tested at 25 lbs. 
- Fold over for shopping light, or extend out for a full load of goods.
- It can easily be collapsed & tied, via a loop-knot feature.

Cleaning Instructions:

name: Half Bow Pouch (Oyster)
description:
The Half Bow Pouch is meant to make your life simple. It's made from a single piece of genuine leather. We chose a thinner leather, so whatever you carry will be super light. To make it easy to open and close, we used a metal flex frame. Perfect for times when all you need is to carry a couple of small items. 

Features:
- Designed & Assembled in Los Angeles, California by Mimot Studio 
- Bag compartment is assembled from one piece of genuine leather. 
- Exterior Footprint: 7" x 5" x 1"
- Available in 5 colors.

Shipping:
FREE GROUND SHIPPING
